segments.text: The girl is so cute, standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s sure her brother will share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent she seems, not even noticing the danger around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so brave, climbing up there to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is missing all the fun, just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could be there to see their faces when they finally get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but it’s almost funny how no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is so full of life and mischief, it’s hard not to smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
